timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we use logging instead? Our logging should have already been initialized when we get here.
timeline.author: blazember
blazember
blazember

timeline.bodyText: Should be logging here and below.
timeline.author: blazember

timeline.bodyText: Would make sense to add a test for negative numbers too. Both for groups and thread count.
timeline.author: blazember

replies.bodyText: Negative integers are not parsed by the parser.
replies.author: pveentjer

replies.bodyText: Shouldn't we get an InvalidAffinitySyntaxException for such a setting?
replies.author: blazember

replies.bodyText: You will. Check the syntax for an integer. it will expect 1 digit followed by zero or more digits. If it sees a '-', it won't recognize it and you get a syntax error.
replies.author: pveentjer
